WorkItem.Description: It has me at about 4,000 hitpoints below what I actually have. Also it says that I am critable, while armory says I have 540 defense. Could it be ignoring the base level 80 stats?

Comments.Message:
My armory link:
http://www.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Smolderthorn&n=Fuseflower

It is set to level 80 for me and level 83 for the boss

Rawr shows 17107 hp and armory shows 21894
Rawr shows 1391 stam and armory shows 1464

If I change the level drop down to anything between 70 and 80, the HP does not change.

Rawr shows .21% chance to be crit. - armory shows 540 defense (which I understand is supposed to be uncritable)

Rawr.Tankadin is still using the lvl 70 base stamina values.  Below is a chart showing what the base stam should be for each race at each level:

	Human	Dwarf	Draenei	BElf
70	120	123	119	118
71	122	125	121	120
72	125	128	124	123
73	127	130	126	125
74	129	132	128	127
75	131	134	130	129
76	134	137	133	132
77	137	139	135	134
78	138	141	137	136
79	141	144	140	139
80	143	146	142	141
Ya, as I said in another post I forgot to update the base stats to 80. It will be corrected for the next version.
